Class BookingTimePeriod

  • java.lang.Object
    • BookingTimePeriod

  • public class BookingTimePeriod
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is a wrapper around booking periods. It serves a double purpose of storing and passing input requests as one object, and for loading the input parameters into an instance of an appropriate datetime-managing class (Calendar, in this case).

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private int DEFAULT_YEAR
      We use 2013 as the default year.
      private int hours 
      private int numWeeks 
      private java.util.Calendar startDate 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BookingTimePeriod(java.lang.String month, int day, int time, int hours, int numWeeks)
      Instantiates a new BookingTimePeriod with the given date, time, and week and hour durations for the booking.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getHours()
      Gets a single booking's duration, in hours.
      int getNumWeeks()
      Get the number of weeks that this booking repeats for.
      java.util.Calendar getTime()
      Gets a copy of the object describing starting date and time for the first booking in this period.

    • Field Detail

      • DEFAULT_YEAR

        private final int DEFAULT_YEAR
        We use 2013 as the default year. This is easily changed once we can specify an actual year in our booking requests.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • startDate

        private java.util.Calendar startDate

      • numWeeks

        private int numWeeks

      • hours

        private int hours

    • Constructor Detail

      • BookingTimePeriod

        public BookingTimePeriod(java.lang.String month,
                 int day,
                 int time,
                 int hours,
                 int numWeeks)
        Instantiates a new BookingTimePeriod with the given date, time, and week and hour durations for the booking.
        Parameters:
        month - Three-letter English abbreviation of the month of the first day of booking.
        day - Day of the month for the first day of booking.
        time - Starting time (hour of day) of every booking in this period.
        hours - Duration, in hours, of ever booking in this period.
        numWeeks - Number of weeks that this booking repeats for.

    • Method Detail

      • getNumWeeks

        public int getNumWeeks()
        Get the number of weeks that this booking repeats for.
        Returns:
        Number of weeks this booking repeats.

      • getHours

        public int getHours()
        Gets a single booking's duration, in hours.
        Returns:
        Duration of a single booking, in hours.

      • getTime

        public java.util.Calendar getTime()
        Gets a copy of the object describing starting date and time for the first booking in this period.
        Returns:
        Copy of very first datetime that this booking runs on.
